name: structReduce
description: Iterates over every entry of the struct and calls the closure to work on the key value pair of the struct. This function will reduce the struct to a single value and will return the value.

params.name: callback
params.description: Closure or a function reference that will be called for each of the iteration.

callback_params.description: The result of the reduce operation after the previous iteration
callback_params.name: result

callback_params.description: The key for the current iteration
callback_params.name: key

callback_params.description: The value for the current iteration
callback_params.name: value

callback_params.description: A reference of the original struct
callback_params.name: struct

params.name: initialVal
params.description: Initial value which will be used for the reduce operation.

links.title: ColdFusion 11: .map() and .reduce()
